response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to us at $1,500,000. Recognizing its significance to you, I propose a fair and advantageous deal. For a limited time, I am extending a special offer to purchase this product at $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving for you while ensuring a reasonable return on investment for me. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
